name: Office Rex
description:
Controls: arrows keys.

Submitted to Weekly Jam 117.Theme "Not a bug".
OK,so you remember the bosses from Deus Ex: Human Revolution,right?The ones in a stealth game that you couldn't beat by stealth so you had to either brute force or glitch through them? This piece of shart is inspired by them and and a lack of effort,time,creativity,assets and shame.In it you must do enough office assignments to get promoted.The moral of the game is: Fake it 'til you make it.

CREDITS:
-Boss
-Tileset by Kenney.nl
